heisig_chinese_memo: The general likes dinner served with a alcoholic thick sauce to go with his whiskey bottle drink. &nbsp
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Chefs love to make thick sauces these days by adding alcohol.  This chef has gone a bit nutty and started making his famous chocolate turtles with alcohol too.
humanum_full_description_en:
" Sauce " characters Qin Jian and Xiao Zhuan make " 𨡓 ", "Said Wen": "𨡓, 盬也. From the meat from the you, to the wine and 𨡓 also; the sound. 𨟻, the ancient Chinese. 𤖙, the text."

Bronze borrow as " will ", said it would be, Zhongshan Wang Fang pot: "𨟻 (the) side by side with Wu Jun world"; also said the generals, nine General Ge: "𨟻 (the) army."

The Bamboo Slips of the Warring States Period means the sauce, which refers to the condiments made by fermentation of wheat, noodles, beans, etc.; it may also refer to the meat sauce marinated in salt and vinegar. Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty" Jane 181: "Half a liter of 𨡓 (sauce), picking (vegetable) 羮". It is also under the guise of "Jiang" to indicate the future, "Tsinghua Jane II. "Relationship" Jane 25: "I (will) ask for help from Cai".

It is also used under the guise of " Zhuang " to express solemnity, "Guodian Jian. "Zun Deyi" Jane 13: "Teaching with music, then the people will succumb to the Qing Dynasty (Zhuang)", Lv Wen (Gu Bo Ling Cui Gong Xing Zhuang): "Gong Qing Zhuang and harmonious, rich and sensitive" (Ji Xusheng).
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from the " unitary ", " valves " sound. "爿" is the first text of " bed ", which is used as sound symbol. " You " is like a wine vessel , " 𨟻 " is a shorthand for " 𨡓 ", originally from " meat ", the original meaning is meat sauce.
humanum_full_description:
「醬」字秦簡、小篆作「𨡓」，《說文》：「𨡓，盬也。从肉从酉，酒以和𨡓也；爿聲。𨟻，古文。𤖙，籒文。」

　　金文借用為「將」，表示將要，中山王方壺：「𨟻(將)與吾君並立於世」；又表示將軍，九年將軍戈：「𨟻(將)軍」。

　　戰國竹簡表示醬汁，指用麥、麵、豆等發酵製成的調味品；也可能指用鹽醋等腌製的肉醬，《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》簡181：「𨡓(醬)半升，采(菜)羮」。又假借為「將」，表示將要，《清華簡二．繫年》簡25：「我𨟻(將)求救於蔡」。

　　又假借為「莊」，表示莊重，《郭店簡．尊德義》簡13：「教以樂，則民淑德清𨟻(莊)」，呂溫〈故博陵崔公行狀〉：「公清莊而和，博厚而敏」(季旭昇)。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「酉」，「爿」聲。「爿」是「牀」的初文，作為聲符。「酉」象酒器，「𨟻」是「𨡓」的簡省，本來從「肉」，本義是肉醬。

醬油 [ jiàng yóu ]: soy sauce
(Simplified: 酱)
Pictophonetic: 將 indicates the sound; 酉 (wine) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 5
Chinese: The general likes dinner served with a alcoholic thick sauce to go with his whiskey bottle drink.  
Meaning: thick sauce
Hanzi: 酱
Story: Chefs love to make thick sauces these days by adding alcohol. This chef has gone a bit nutty and started making his famous chocolate turtles with alcohol too.
Kind: traditional

「 醬 」字秦簡、小篆作「 𨡓 」，《說文》：「𨡓，盬也。从肉从酉，酒以和𨡓也；爿聲。𨟻，古文。𤖙，籒文。」 金文借用為「 將 」，表示將要，中山王方壺：「𨟻(將)與吾君並立於世」；又表示將軍，九年將軍戈：「𨟻(將)軍」。 戰國竹簡表示醬汁，指用麥、麵、豆等發酵製成的調味品；也可能指用鹽醋等腌製的肉醬，《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》簡181：「𨡓(醬)半升，采(菜)羮」。又假借為「 將 」，表示將要，《清華簡二．繫年》簡25：「我𨟻(將)求救於蔡」。 又假借為「 莊 」，表示莊重，《郭店簡．尊德義》簡13：「教以樂，則民淑德清𨟻(莊)」，呂溫〈故博陵崔公行狀〉：「公清莊而和，博厚而敏」(季旭昇)。

醬字的基本解释

醬
jiàng
见“酱”。

醬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàng］
［《廣韻》子亮切，去漾，精。］
“酱1”的繁体字。“醤1”的繁体字。
(1)用盐醋等调料腌制而成的肉酱。
(2)用麦、面、豆等发酵制成的调味品。
(3)将鱼、肉、蔬、果捣烂制成的糊状食品。
(4)泛指糊状物。
(5)用酱或酱油腌制、浸渍。
(6)搅混；沾染。

醬字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醬； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1287第17
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【正韻】子亮切【韻會】卽亮切，?音將。【說文】醢也。【韻會】醢，肉醬也。又豉醬。又菜茹亦謂之醬。【正字通】麥麪米豆皆可罨黃，加鹽曝之成醬。【禮·曲禮】醯醬處內。【周禮·天官·膳夫】醬用百有二十罋。【註】醬，謂醯醢也。【史記·西南夷傳】南越食蒙蜀枸醬。【註】劉德云：枸樹如桑，其椹長二三寸，味酢，取其實以爲醬。【枚乗·七發】熊蹯之臑，芍藥之醬。　【說文】本作?。臑字原从足从而作。

醬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
醬字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
sauce

sauce
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàng］
["Guangyun" sub-bright cut, go to Yang, fine. ]
Traditional characters for "酱1". "醤1" in traditional characters.
(1) Meat sauce marinated with seasonings such as salt and vinegar.
(2) Condiments made from the fermentation of wheat, noodles, beans, etc.
(3) A mashed food made by mashing fish, meat, vegetables, and fruits.
(4) Generally refers to paste.
(5) Pickled and dipped in sauce or soy sauce.
(6) Stirring; contaminating.
sauce

[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　 sauce; Kangxi strokes: 18; page number: page 1287 to 17
[Ancient text]? [Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Zi Liang cut [Yun Hui] 卽 Liang cut, "Yin Jiang. [Said the text] Yan Ye. [Rhyme Club] 醢, meat sauce also. Soy sauce again. You Cairu is also called the sauce. 【Zhengzitong】Wheat noodles, rice beans and beans can be simmered, add salt to make a sauce. 【Li·Chu Li】In the sauce shop. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Sinfu】There are hundreds of urns for sauce. [Note] Sauce is called 醯醢also. [Historical Records · Southwest Yi Chuan] Nanyue eats Mongolian shu citron sauce. [Note] Liu Deyun: The medlar tree is like a mulberry, and its fruit is two or three inches long, and it tastes sour, which is actually regarded as a sauce. [Meicheng·Seven Hair] Xiongjiaozhifu, the sauce of peony.　【Said the text】This work?. The word "Xian" was originally made from the foot.
